channel.title: Exilium custom client to normal client. plz help
channel.description: I am using Exilium source + client is there any way that i could change Exilium custom login screen to normal(EarasedPK)? and can u tell me how to do it?

item.title: Exilium custom client to normal client. plz help
item.dc:creator: @Palastinescape Palastinescape
item.description:
@Palastinescape wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:519329”]You should be able to refer to this guide here

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/307773-pi-new-login-screen.html

and re-add what was originally there. For further research you can even go download an old erasedpk type of source and compare the codes.[/quote]

thnx and im sorry for posting this topic in wrong section.

Read full topic
item.source: Exilium custom client to normal client. plz help

item.title: Exilium custom client to normal client. plz help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You should be able to refer to this guide here

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/307773-pi-new-login-screen.html

and re-add what was originally there. For further research you can even go download an old erasedpk type of source and compare the codes.
